entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 5. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early this morning. Fog patches. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 9 this morning and minus 14 this afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Wednesday 11 January 2023
